short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To activate: type 'kk' followed by a space, then enter the alias to resolve.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The browser extension for http://kotlink.org/
First, get an instance of KotLink server running inside of your organization.
Second, configure the server URL and extension secret via extension Options.
Lastly, to activate: type 'kk' in address bar followed by a space and your alias.
